name: 2021 3rd International Conference on Smart Power & Internet Energy Systems
content: Publication: Conference proceedings to be archived into IEEE Xplore Digital Library, and will be indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus. •Special Issue for IAS periodicals (IEEE Transactions on Industry Applications \[Impact Factor 3.488\]), and IEEE Industry Applications Magazine \[Impact Factor 1.093\]) – 20% papers will be recommended; •Special Issue for Sustainable Energy Technologies and Assessments’ Journal (Impact Factor 3.427).
